positions.subtitle: Frost & Sullivan
positions.description: Analyzed market trends & user behavior in shared mobility (ridehailing, carsharing,DRT, MaaS and allied spaces etc.)Leveraged data & industry knowledge to solve client challenges in the global shared mobility market.Developed data-driven recommendations to inform business strategy in shared mobility.Presented market research findings & insights to clients for effective decision-making. In-depth knowledge of the shared mobility industry, including market dynamics, regulations, and future growth prospects.
positions.title: Research Manager
positions.description_html:
Analyzed market trends & user behavior in shared mobility (ridehailing, carsharing,DRT, MaaS and allied spaces etc.)
Leveraged data & industry knowledge to solve client challenges in the global shared mobility market.
Developed data-driven recommendations to inform business strategy in shared mobility.
Presented market research findings & insights to clients for effective decision-making.
In-depth knowledge of the shared mobility industry, including market dynamics, regulations, and future growth prospects.

positions.subtitle: Frost & Sullivan
positions.description: Over 2 years of consulting experience, especially automotive market research and market strategy development. Specific expertise in:Qualitative and quantitative market analysis Benchmarking & positioning Diversification and new market entryData and information analysisValidation and industry analysisReport developmentExtensive Expertise in New Mobility Space ( Carsharing, Ridesharing, Ridehailing, Bikesharing, Multimodal Travel Management Services, Carsharing Technology, OEM Mobility Strategies)
positions.title: Senior Research Analyst
positions.description_html:
Over 2 years of consulting experience, especially automotive market research and market strategy development. Specific expertise in:
Qualitative and quantitative market analysis
Benchmarking & positioning
Diversification and new market entry
Data and information analysis
Validation and industry analysis
Report development

Extensive Expertise in New Mobility Space ( Carsharing, Ridesharing, Ridehailing, Bikesharing, Multimodal Travel Management Services, Carsharing Technology, OEM Mobility Strategies)

positions.subtitle: Infosys Technologies Ltd
positions.description: Roles & Responsibilities:--- Responsible for reviewing the Business requirements document by way of having discussion       with the business users to ensure the feasibility of the requirements from a system perspective--- Accountable for creation of system requirements documents by analyzing the business     requirements and having discussions with the clients and developers.--- Validate and correct the ETL FSD and data dictionary documents for one of the projects.       Understand the tables to be migrated to the new bank and derive the extraction criteria,     transformation rules and masking rules based on analyzing the data.--- Responsible for updating and maintaining the requirements traceability matrix--- Use IBM rational requisite pro to maintain and keep track of changes to the requirements--- Responsible for giving a walkthrough of the requirements document to the business users,     developers and testers and make the required modification if required--- Responsible for reviewing and getting a sign off for the test cases prepared by the testers---  Responsible for correcting and keeping track of defects through HP Quality Centre---  Provide support to the onsite team during CAT testingProject DetailsInvolved in three projects mainly in the area of banking. I was responsible for analyzing and structuring the requirements based on the business users stories/ enhancements necessitated by the regulatory and business mandated changes
positions.title: Associate consultant,Financial Services
positions.description_html:
Roles & Responsibilities:
--- Responsible for reviewing the Business requirements document by way of having discussion
with the business users to ensure the feasibility of the requirements from a system perspective
--- Accountable for creation of system requirements documents by analyzing the business
requirements and having discussions with the clients and developers.
--- Validate and correct the ETL FSD and data dictionary documents for one of the projects.
Understand the tables to be migrated to the new bank and derive the extraction criteria,
transformation rules and masking rules based on analyzing the data.
--- Responsible for updating and maintaining the requirements traceability matrix
--- Use IBM rational requisite pro to maintain and keep track of changes to the requirements
--- Responsible for giving a walkthrough of the requirements document to the business users,
developers and testers and make the required modification if required
--- Responsible for reviewing and getting a sign off for the test cases prepared by the testers
--- Responsible for correcting and keeping track of defects through HP Quality Centre
--- Provide support to the onsite team during CAT testing

Project Details
Involved in three projects mainly in the area of banking. I was responsible for analyzing and structuring the requirements based on the business users stories/ enhancements necessitated by the regulatory and business mandated changes

experience.title: Summer Internship
experience.description: Work-Life Balance – A research on understanding the work-life balance among the employees of WABCO-TVS (INDIA) Limited--- Analyzed the factors like the facilities available in the workplace, relationship with the superiors and     control over the work they do etc---The results from the research were used by the HR team to understand the needs of the employees    better and bring about the necessary changes"

volunteer_experience.info: As a part of this we went to a government girls home and mentored the girls on life skills, communication skills and career options. The Government girls home had girls who were orphans or who's families had abandoned them.

volunteer_experience.info: Visited the Kannada medium schools in Mysore and taught the primary school children spoken English.Prepared artifacts and tools that would facilitate the teaching process and to make the learning process interesting for the children
